<h3 id="X38127">X(38127) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(8), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 5*(b+c)*a^3-(b+3*c)*(3*b+c)*a^2-5*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38127) = 5*X(1)-11*X(3525) = X(3)+2*X(3626) = 2*X(5)-5*X(10) = 8*X(5)-5*X(946) = 6*X(5)-5*X(3817) = 14*X(5)-5*X(4301) = X(5)+5*X(5690) = 13*X(5)-10*X(9955) = 7*X(5)-10*X(9956) = 4*X(5)-5*X(10175) = 4*X(5)+5*X(11362) = 11*X(5)-5*X(22791) = 7*X(5)-5*X(38034) = 3*X(5)-5*X(38042) = X(5)-5*X(38112) = 4*X(10)-X(946) = 3*X(10)-X(3817) = 7*X(10)-X(4301) = X(10)+2*X(5690) = 13*X(10)-4*X(9955) = 7*X(10)-4*X(9956) = 2*X(10)+X(11362) = 11*X(10)-2*X(22791) = 8*X(10)-5*X(31399) = 7*X(10)-2*X(38034) = 3*X(10)-2*X(38042)</b>
<p>X(38127) lies on these lines: {1,3525}, {2,16200}, {3,3626}, {4,28232}, {5,10}, {8,3523}, {30,38098}, {40,3146}, {140,3244}, {145,31423}, {165,376}, {210,2800}, {354,31397}, {355,1657}, {381,28228}, {511,38191}, {516,3654}, {518,38123}, {519,3653}, {549,31662}, {551,5844}, {631,3632}, {632,15808}, {758,10273}, {944,4668}, {952,4669}, {962,3854}, {971,38210}, {1064,31855}, {1125,10247}, {1145,4847}, {1210,5919}, {1385,3625}, {1482,3634}, {1698,11224}, {2801,24393}, {2802,24386}, {3036,4640}, {3090,11531}, {3305,12703}, {3488,30286}, {3526,3636}, {3579,12103}, {3628,11278}, {3655,15718}, {3656,10171}, {3678,37562}, {3681,6735}, {3697,20117}, {3698,31870}, {3707,12034}, {3828,5886}, {3839,5587}, {3860,28212}, {3911,12647}, {3918,24474}, {3983,12672}, {4015,5887}, {4067,35004}, {4078,7611}, {4134,14988}, {4297,28224}, {4662,31788}, {4677,7967}, {4678,5881}, {4701,37727}, {4746,12645}, {4816,30389}, {4848,5902}, {5245,11752}, {5246,11789}, {5288,6940}, {5295,22004}, {5432,36920}, {5493,18480}, {5603,10172}, {5688,6280}, {5689,6279}, {5731,15705}, {5762,38201}, {5818,7991}, {5840,38213}, {5846,38118}, {5847,38116}, {5850,38121}, {5853,38130}, {5854,38133}, {5855,38134}, {5884,34790}, {6361,37714}, {6883,25439}, {7294,33176}, {7982,9780}, {8164,18421}, {9519,12618}, {9624,19877}, {9778,28172}, {10196,28292}, {10202,10915}, {10283,19883}, {10303,20050}, {10389,18391}, {10595,16191}, {10916,12640}, {11010,26878}, {12053,18395}, {12102,18357}, {12511,18518}, {12512,18525}, {12702,19925}, {13405,14563}, {14893,28174}, {15702,34747}, {16189,19872}, {18239,18908}, {18492,20070}, {19710,28160}, {19862,24680}, {19876,34631}, {28146,34648}, {28168,34638}, {28198,38081}, {31663,37705}</p>
<p>
X(38127) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 3576}, {376, 37712}, {3654, 5790}, {3679, 5657}, {4669, 10164}, {4677, 7967}, {5690, 38112}, {5886, 34718}, {10175, 11362}, {11224, 12245}<br>
X(38127) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 38112), (551, 11231), (946, 10175), (3576, 6684), (3656, 10171), (3817, 38042), (4301, 38034), (5603, 10172), (5790, 4745), (5882, 3576), (5886, 3828), (10165, 26446), (10175, 10), (10247, 1125), (11224, 13464), (34648, 38138), (38034, 9956), (38155, 38176)<br>
X(38127) = complement of X(16200)<br>
X(38127) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(10175)<br>
X(38127) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (8, 6684, 5882), (10, 946, 31399), (10, 3817, 38042), (10, 4301, 9956), (10, 5690, 11362), (10, 11362, 946), (631, 3632, 13607), (632, 33179, 15808), (1698, 12245, 13464), (3817, 38042, 10175), (4668, 9588, 944), (4848, 10039, 21620), (5603, 19875, 10172), (5818, 7991, 18483), (10165, 26446, 38068), (38098, 38155, 38176)<br>
</p>
